items.title: Technology and the Future of the Creative Industry
items.content_html: Utopai Studios Co-Founder and CEO Cecilia Chen and ElevenLabs Co-Founder and CEO Mati Staniszewski discuss how AI and new technologies are transforming how stories are created and shared with Bloomberg's Ashish Verma at Bloomberg House in Davos on the sidelines of the 2026 World Economic Forum. (Source: Bloomberg)

items.title: Elliman’s Exclusive Group nabs Royal Palm’s managing partner
items.content_html: The longtime managing partner at one of Boca Raton’s top brokerages left the company to join Douglas Elliman’s Exclusive Group, The Real Deal has learned.  Kelly Brooks joined the Elliman team as a partner, according to a news release. The group is led by Nick Malinosky and Devin Kay, and is ranked Elliman’s top medium-sized team in Florida.  Brooks has been a licensed agent since 2006, state records show. Her license was moved to Douglas Elliman on Jan. 9.  Brooks was managing partner of Boca-based Royal Palm Properties, a firm led by David Roberts, the top-ranked real estate agent in […] This article originally appeared on The Real Deal. Click here to read the full story.

Her license was moved to Douglas Elliman on Jan. 9.  Brooks was managing partner of Boca-based Royal Palm Properties, a firm led by David Roberts, the top-ranked real estate agent in […] This article originally appeared on The Real Deal. items.title: Movers & Shakers: Centennial Bank adds two lending VPs
items.content_html: In the latest roundup of South Florida real estate hiring news, firms sought to bolster their leadership in the region.  Centennial Bank hired two executives in South Florida to bulk up its lending capacity in the region, according to a news release. Frank de Ona and Sonia Suazo both join the bank as vice presidents focusing on commercial lending. De Ona was previously a vice president at Ocean Bank for more than six years. Suazo joins from TD, where she was a vice president in commercial lending for six years.  Douglas Elliman brought in Nir Perets to head sales at […] This article originally appeared on The Real Deal. Click here to read the full story.

items.title: L Catterton boss sells Palm Beach home for $58M
items.content_html: Michael Chu sold the home he his wife built in Palm Beach 10 years ago for $58.3 million.  He and his wife Elizabeth Chu sold that house in an off-market deal that recorded this week. Records show they sold the oceanfront house at 102 Angler Avenue to a trust named for the address and managed by attorney Sarah T. Connolly. Michael Chu is the executive chairman and co-founder of L Catterton, the largest consumer-focused private equity firm in the world, according to its website. It has $37 billion in assets under management.  The Chus acquired the 0.60-acre property for $1 […] This article originally appeared on The Real Deal. Click here to read the full story.
